spell_tooltip.description: Bestial Wrath now provides immunity to Fear and Horror effects for you and your pets for 8 sec. Nearby allied pets are also inspired, increasing their attack speed by 10%.
Call of the Wild additionally summons a slow moving basilisk near your target for 30 sec that attacks the target for heavy damage.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.5 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 367,161 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Natural Mending now reduces the cooldown of Exhilaration by an additional 0.5 sec

Mend Pet heals for an additional 25% of your pet's health over its duration, and has a 25% chance to dispel a magic effect each time it heals your pet.

Hurls a tar trap to the target location that creates a 8 yd radius pool of tar around itself for 30 sec when the first enemy approaches. All enemies have 50% reduced movement speed while in the area of effect. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Removes 1 Enrage and 1 Magic effect from an enemy target.

Successfully dispelling an effect generates 10 Focus.
Reduces all damage you and your pet take by 30% for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Tranquilizing Shot removes up to 1 additional Magic effect from up to 2 nearby targets.
Survival of the Fittest gains an additional charge.

Reduce the cooldown of Survival of the Fittest by 30 sec, and increase its duration by 2.0 sec.

Reduce the cooldown of Counter Shot and Muzzle by 2 sec.
Kill Command deals 10% increased damage.
When Tranquilizing Shot successfully dispels an effect or Counter Shot interrupts a cast, gain 10 Focus.

Commands your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 5 sec.

Targets stunned by Intimidation deal 10% less damage to you for 8 sec after the effect ends.

Fires a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yds for 10 sec, stunning them for 3 sec if they move more than 5 yds from the arrow.

Targets stunned by Binding Shot deal 10% less damage to you for 8 sec after the effect ends.
Fires an explosion of bolts at all enemies in front of you, knocking them back, snaring them by 50% for 6 sec, and dealing 5,923 Physical damage.

You and your pet have 5.0% increased attack speed.

This effect is increased by 100% if you do not have an active pet.
Critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Casting Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Intimidation and Binding Shot by 0.5 sec.
Movement speed increased by 4%.

Targets stunned by Binding Shot, knocked back by High Explosive Trap, knocked up by Implosive Trap, incapacitated by Scatter Shot, or stunned by Intimidation deal 10% less damage to you for 8 sec after the effect ends.
You and your pet blend into the surroundings and gain stealth for 1 min. While camouflaged, you will heal for 2% of maximum health every 1 sec.
Your movement speed is increased by 30% anytime you have not attacked for 3 sec.
You gain 5% more critical strike from critical strike sources.
Reduces the cooldowns of Aspect of the Cheetah, and Aspect of the Turtle by 30 sec.
Feign Death and Aspect of the Turtle removes poison and disease effects from you.

Hurls a fire trap to the target location that explodes when an enemy approaches, causing 61,358 Fire damage and knocking all enemies up. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Targets knocked up by Implosive Trap deal 10% less damage to you for 8 sec after being knocked up.

Your damage over time effects deal 10% increased damage.

This effect is increased by 50% on targets below 20% health.
Give the command to kill, causing your pet to savagely deal 161,487 Physical damage to the enemy.

A quick shot causing 176,196 Physical damage.

Reduces the cooldown of Kill Command by 1 sec.
Your Call Pet additionally summons the pet from the bonus slot in your stable. This pet will obey your Kill Command, but cannot use pet family abilities.

Fire a shot that tears through your enemy, causing them to bleed for 439,039 damage over 14 sec and  increases your critical strike chance by 2% for 14 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Sends your pet into a frenzy, increasing attack speed by 30% for 14 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Generates 20 Focus over 8 sec.
Passive Focus generation increased by 125%.
Barbed Shot deals 10% increased damage, and applying Barbed Shot has a 50% chance to reset the cooldown of Kill Command.
Barbed Shot increases your critical strike chance by 2% for 14 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Kill Command deals increased critical strike damage equal to 100% of your critical strike chance.
Fires several missiles, hitting all nearby enemies within 8 yds of your current target for 84,960 Physical damage and triggering Beast Cleave. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
When your pet attacks critically strike, they cause their target to bleed for 8% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.
Kill Command now has 2 charges, and deals 15% increased damage.

After you Multi-Shot, your pet's melee attacks also strike all nearby enemies for 80% of the damage and Kill Command strikes all nearby enemies for 80% of the damage for the next 6.0 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Your auto shot critical strikes have a 20% chance to reset the cooldown of Barbed Shot.

Direct damage from Barbed Shot has a 30% chance to explode on impact, applying Serpent Sting and dealing 135,936 Nature damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

 Serpent Sting
Fire a shot that poisons your target, causing them to take 33,610 Nature damage instantly and an additional 174,329 Nature damage over 18 sec.
When you cast Barbed Shot, your pet stomps the ground, dealing 75,384 Physical damage to its primary target and 77,059 Physical damage to all other nearby enemies.
While Beast Cleave is active, Kill Command now also strikes nearby enemies for 80% of damage dealt. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
All pet damage dealt increased by 5%.
Kill Command damage is increased by 10%. Barbed Shot lasts 2.0 sec longer.

Sends you and your pet into a rage, instantly dealing 209,327 Physical damage to its target, and increasing all damage you both deal by 30% for 15 sec. Removes all crowd control effects from your pet. 

Bestial Wrath's remaining cooldown is reduced by 12 sec each time you use Barbed Shot and activating Bestial Wrath grants 1 charge of Barbed Shot.
Kill Command has a 20% chance to also summon a Dire Beast to attack your target for 10 sec.
Kill Command deals 50% increased damage against enemies below 35% health.
Barbed Shot reduces the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 12.0 sec.
Dire Beast lasts an additional 4 sec and deals 120% increased damage.

You sound the call of the wild, summoning 2 of your active pets for 20 sec. During this time, a random pet from your stable will appear every 4 sec to assault your target for 6 sec. 

Each time Call of the Wild summons a pet, the cooldown of Barbed Shot and Kill Command are reduced by 25%.
While Bestial Wrath is active, Cobra Shot resets the cooldown on Kill Command.
Activating Bestial Wrath grants 1 charge of Barbed Shot.
While Call of the Wild is active, your pets have the effects of Beast Cleave, and each time Call of the Wild summons a pet, all of your pets Stomp.
While Bestial Wrath is active, your pet's critical damage dealt is increased by 35%.

While in combat, every 25 sec your next Kill Command summons the aid of a Beast.

 Wyvern
A Wyvern descends from the skies, letting out a battle cry that increases the damage of you and your pets by 10% for 15 sec.

 Boar
A Boar charges through your target 3 times, dealing 618,849 physical damage to the primary target and 247,539 damage to up to 8 nearby enemies.

 Bear
A Bear leaps into the fray, rending the flesh of your enemies, dealing 846,615 damage over 10 sec to up to 8 nearby enemies.

Howl of the Pack Leader increases the damage of your Kill Command by 50%.

Summoning a Beast reduces the cooldown of Barbed Shot by 10.0 sec.

Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Cobra Shot reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Howl of the Pack Leader's cooldown is reduced to 25 sec.

Your pets gain an extra 5% of your attack power.
Your Bear's periodic damage has a 10% chance to reduce the cooldown of Kill Command by 1.0 sec.

Your pet's attacks increase your Wyvern's damage bonus by 1%, up to 10%.

Casting Kill Command extends the duration of your Wyvern by 1.0 sec, up to 10 additional sec.
Each time your Boar deals damage, the damage of your next Cobra Shot is increased by 25% and Cobra Shot strikes 1 additional target. Stacks up to 4 times.

Damage from your Kill Shot sends your pets into a rage, causing all active pets within 20 yds and your Bear to pounce to the target and Smack, Claw, or Bite it.

Your pets will not leap if their target is already in melee range.

When dropping below 60% health, summon the aid of a Turtle, reducing the damage you take by 10% for 6 sec.

This effect can only occur once every 1.5 min.
When an enemy is stunned by Binding Shot, it is dragged to Binding Shot's center.
Casting Bestial Wrath grants Howl of the Pack Leader and increases the damage dealt by your Beasts by 25% and your pets by 15% for 12 sec.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.5 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 359,582 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Natural Mending now reduces the cooldown of Exhilaration by an additional 0.5 sec

Kill Command has a 10% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.

Natural Mending now reduces the cooldown of Exhilaration by an additional 0.5 sec

When your pet attacks critically strike, they cause their target to bleed for 8% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.
Kill Command now has 2 charges, and deals 15% increased damage.
Your auto shot has a 15% chance to also fire a Cobra Shot at your target.

After you Multi-Shot, your pet's melee attacks also strike all nearby enemies for 80% of the damage and Kill Command strikes all nearby enemies for 80% of the damage for the next 6.0 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Your auto shot critical strikes have a 20% chance to reset the cooldown of Barbed Shot.

Direct damage from Barbed Shot has a 30% chance to explode on impact, applying Serpent Sting and dealing 133,715 Nature damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

 Serpent Sting
Fire a shot that poisons your target, causing them to take 33,610 Nature damage instantly and an additional 174,329 Nature damage over 18 sec.
When you cast Barbed Shot, your pet stomps the ground, dealing 75,911 Physical damage to its primary target and 75,522 Physical damage to all other nearby enemies.

Casting Cobra Shot increases its damage by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times.

Upon reaching 4 stacks, the bonus is removed and you gain 8% increased pet damage for 8 sec.
While Beast Cleave is active, Kill Command now also strikes nearby enemies for 80% of damage dealt. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Summons a powerful wild beast that attacks the target and roars, increasing your Haste by 5% for 10 sec.

Generates 20 Focus.
Kill Command damage is increased by 10%. Barbed Shot lasts 2.0 sec longer.

Sends you and your pet into a rage, instantly dealing 209,327 Physical damage to its target, and increasing all damage you both deal by 30% for 15 sec. Removes all crowd control effects from your pet. 

Bestial Wrath's remaining cooldown is reduced by 12 sec each time you use Barbed Shot and activating Bestial Wrath grants 1 charge of Barbed Shot.
Kill Command has a 20% chance to also summon a Dire Beast to attack your target for 10 sec.

Every 3 casts of Dire Beast sounds the Horn of Valor, summoning either Hati or Fenryr to battle.

Hati
Increases the damage of all your pets by 8%.

Fenryr
Pounces your primary target, inflicting a heavy bleed that deals 341,441 damage over 8 sec and grants you 8% Haste.
When summoned, Dire Beasts gain Beast Cleave at 100% effectiveness for 8.0 sec.
Barbed Shot reduces the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 12.0 sec.
Dire Beast lasts an additional 4 sec and deals 120% increased damage.
Activating Bestial Wrath grants 2 charges of Barbed Shot.
While Bestial Wrath is active, your pet's critical damage dealt is increased by 35%.

Howl of the Pack Leader increases the damage of your Kill Command by 50%.

Summoning a Beast reduces the cooldown of Barbed Shot by 10.0 sec.

Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Cobra Shot reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Howl of the Pack Leader's cooldown is reduced to 25 sec.

Your pets gain an extra 5% of your attack power.
Your Bear's periodic damage has a 10% chance to reduce the cooldown of Kill Command by 1.0 sec.

Your pet's attacks increase your Wyvern's damage bonus by 1%, up to 10%.

Casting Kill Command extends the duration of your Wyvern by 1.0 sec, up to 10 additional sec.
Each time your Boar deals damage, the damage of your next Cobra Shot is increased by 25% and Cobra Shot strikes 1 additional target. Stacks up to 4 times.

Damage from your Kill Shot sends your pets into a rage, causing all active pets within 20 yds and your Bear to pounce to the target and Smack, Claw, or Bite it.

Your pets will not leap if their target is already in melee range.

When dropping below 60% health, summon the aid of a Turtle, reducing the damage you take by 10% for 6 sec.

This effect can only occur once every 1.5 min.
When an enemy is stunned by Binding Shot, it is dragged to Binding Shot's center.
Casting Bestial Wrath grants Howl of the Pack Leader and increases the damage dealt by your Beasts by 25% and your pets by 15% for 12 sec.
Trueshot and Volley increase the range of all shots by 30% for their duration.

Casting Aimed Shot provides you with Ranger's Finesse. After gaining 3 stacks of Ranger's Finesse, increase your next Volley's radius and duration by 50%.

Consuming Ranger's Finesse reduces the remaining cooldown of Aspect of the Turtle by 20 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 361,331 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 441,708 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
